mapper.insert: insert into mr_job_tasks_schedule( consume_lane, assign_node, data_table, register_time, heart_beat_date, dispose_schedule, alarm_number, insert_number, update_number, del_number, create_user_id, update_user_id, create_time, update_time, state, iscancel, remark ) values ( #{consumeLane}, #{assignNode}, #{dataTable}, #{registerTime}, #{heartBeatDate}, #{disposeSchedule}, #{alarmNumber}, #{insertNumber}, #{updateNumber}, #{delNumber}, #{createUserId}, #{updateUserId}, #{createTime}, #{upDATETIME}, #{state}, #{iscancel}, #{remark} )
